FuncDef: This command specifies up to eight DHCPv4/v6 server addresses for DHCPv4/v6-based address assignment. If multiple server addresses are specified, the first advertised DHCPv4/v6 address received will be chosen.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a unicast IPv4 address (for DHCPv4) or global unicast IPv6 address (for DHCPv6).
Specifies the router instance ID used to reach the configured server address. Values-{router-name | vprn-svc-id}. ParamDefault: Default- Base
Specifies the name of the IES or VPRN service used to reach the configured server address, up to 64 characters.
